evidence: the whole function is fixed in space
signal we measure is subject to T2 star decay
reconstruction is no longer a simple Fourier transform
machine learning and advanced reconstruction methods can play a big role
modern approaches are being used to solve these challenges

concepts.term: assume that the readout is fast enough, so that no significant T2 star decay occurs during acquisition
